name: Fire Minion
description:
Fire minions are lesser beings of elemental fire that serve more powerful masters.

**Combat**: Flame touch attacks and small explosions.

**Habitat/Society**: Elemental Plane of Fire.

**Ecology**: Consume flammable materials.

name: Frog, Giant
description:
Giant frogs are oversized amphibians that use their tongues to capture prey.

**Combat**: Bite attacks and swallow prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Swamps and wetlands.

**Ecology**: Feed on insects and small animals.
